devdoc.author: Carlos Ramos
devdoc.details: contract needs to check weather the caller is a member of the DAO - need to add terminus

params.player: - the one owner of the combination

params.gameData: - data of the new game created
params.gameId: - the index of the new game

params.isFinalMove: - weather will require you to submit combination
params.player: - the one who submits the move
- the one who joins the session
- the one who opened the session
params.sessionData: - data of the session, data contains weather a session can be started
params.sessionId: - the index of the new session

params.combinationHash: - the combination hash of the player who joins this session

params._rules: - the set of rules that the game has to follow
params._tokenAddr: - the address of the 1155 to give after completing this game
params._validUntil: - the deadline to play this game

params.combinationHash: - the combination hash of the first player
params.gameId: - the index of the game to open a session for

setGameEngine(address).details: Owner can set the game engine Addr

submitCombitation(uint256,string,bytes).details: submits a combination to be verified with the initial hashed combination

params.combination: - the combination submitted when joined the game
params.key: - the key the user used to submit when joined the game

params._move: - the data of the move being submitted

devdoc.title: SmartFacet Smart Contract

GameOpened(uint256,(address,uint256,uint.notice: Emitted when Game is opened by the owner

MoveSubmitted(uint256,(bytes,uint8,addre.notice: Emitted when a move is submitted

SessionJoined(uint256,(address[],bytes32.notice: Emitted when a user joins a session

SessionOpened(uint256,(address[],bytes32.notice: Emitted when a new session is created

joinSession(uint256,bytes32).notice: joins a session that is already existing and pending

openSession(uint256,bytes32).notice: creates a session for the a given game

submitMove((bytes,uint8,address),uint256.notice: submits a move for the ongoing session         only if is the turn of the caller
